screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .aq file in Incline Software Ancestral Quest 16
screenshot.caption: AQ file open in Incline Software Ancestral Quest 16

description: Ancestral Quest allows you to record, organize, and visualize your family tree. When you save your information in the software by selecting File → New... , Ancestral Quest creates an AQ file, by default, to store the information. You can save, close, and re-open the AQ file to further edit your family tree.

You can also back up your AQ database as an .AQZ file to save space by selecting File → Backup... . Or you can export the information in an AQ database to the .GED genealogical database format by selecting File → Export... .

images.caption: AQ file open in Incline Software Ancestral Quest 16
